data.prayer: Lord, please give the 3,021 believers in the county of Tarn-et-Garonne the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tarn-et-Garonne, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Tarn-et-Garonne, Occitanie, France with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 3,021 believers in Tarn-et-Garonne to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 242,879 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 242,879 lost in Tarn-et-Garonne that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Iu Mien people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Tarn-et-Garonne.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Tarn-et-Garonne that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the county of Tarn-et-Garonne, Occitanie, France has a population of 245,900.

We estimate Tarn-et-Garonne has 3,021 people who might know Jesus, 150,373 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 92,506 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Tarn-et-Garonne, Occitanie, France find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
